mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pas caerte van Niev-Nederland en de Engelsche Virginies: van Cabo Cod, tot Cabo Canrik
Pas caerte van Nieu-Nederland en de Engelsche Virginies
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Loon, J. van, approximately 1611-1686
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: By Iohannes van Loon, Plaetsnyder en Zee caertmaecker
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Three scales: Dutch, Spanish, and English/French miles.
"Virginia New England" is handwritten on verso, with other manuscript annotations in right margin and in the body of the map.
First published in 1661 in "Klaer lichtende noort-ster ofte Zee atlas" and also appeared in the editions of 1666 and 1668. Cf. McCorkle.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Nautical charts--Early works to 1800
North America--Maps--Early works to 1800
New England--Maps--Early works to 1800
Virginia--Maps--Early works to 1800
